roles.description: Started as a Frontend Developer Intern, building responsive UI components, improving existing pages, and learning real-world development workflows.
Internship extended based on performance. Contributed to major features, optimized performance, and worked closely with senior developers to solve production-level problems.

Promoted to Full-Time Frontend Developer. Built scalable modules, implemented reusable components, improved page performance, and delivered key production features in collaboration with design and backend teams.

Worked as a Frontend Developer Intern, gaining hands-on experience by contributing to responsive web applications, implementing UI components using React.js and Tailwind CSS, and integrating APIs. This internship helped strengthen my real-world development skills and gave me exposure to production-ready workflows.
